sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import TopNav from './../../../../navbar/Topnav' import Sidebar from './../../../../navbar/SideBar' import FormValidator from './../../../../../utils/Validator'; class AddChiefExecutive extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.validator = new FormValidator([ { field: 'fname', method: 'isEmpty', validWhen: false, message: 'First Name is required.' }, { field: 'lname', method: 'isEmpty', validWhen: false, message: 'Last Name is required.' }, { field: 'uname', method: 'isEmpty', validWhen: false, message: 'User Name is required.' }, { field: 'email', method: 'isEmpty', validWhen: false, message: 'Email is required.' }, { field: 'email', method: 'isEmail', validWhen: true, message: 'That is not a valid email.' }, { field: 'doj', method: 'isEmpty', validWhen: false, message: 'DOJ is required.' }, { field: 'dob', method: 'isEmpty', validWhen: false, message: 'DOB is required.' }, { field: 'mobile', method: 'isEmpty', validWhen: false, message: 'Pleave provide a phone number.' }, { field: 'mobile', method: 'matches', args: [/^\(?\d\d\d\)? ?\d\d\d-?\d\d\d\d$/], // args is an optional array of arguements that will be passed to the validation method validWhen: true, message: 'That is not a valid phone number.' } ]); this.state = { fname: '', lname: '', uname: '', gender:'', email: '', mobile: '', dob: '', doj: '', password: '', password_confirmation: '', validation: this.validator.valid(), } this.submitted = false; } inputChange = event => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(event) this.setState({ [ event.target.name ] : event.target.value }) console.log(this.state) } createUser = event => { event.preventDefault(); const validation = this.validator.validate(this.state); this.setState({ validation }); this.submitted = true; } render() { let validation = this.submitted ? this.validator.validate(this.state) : this.state.validation return (
Add Chief Executive


{validation.fname.message}
{validation.lname.message}
{validation.uname.message}
{validation.doj.message}
{validation.dob.message}
{validation.email.message}
{validation.mobile.message}
) } } export default AddChiefExecutive
